snippet: Enthusiasts look to revive the sport’s popularity through “gimmick” rallies, in which understanding the cryptic instructions is as important as precision driving.
abstract: Enthusiasts are hoping to revive popularity of automobile rallying, in which motorists follow a specific route and engage in challenges; some organizers are trying to raise sport's profile by organizing 'gimmick' rallies, in which understanding cryptic instructions is as important as precision driving.
lead_paragraph: Enthusiasts look to revive the sport’s popularity through “gimmick” rallies, in which understanding the cryptic instructions is as important as precision driving.

headline.main: To Bring Back the Drivers, Rallies Add Brain-Teasers
headline.print_headline: To Bring Back the Drivers, Rallies Add Brain-Teasers
